statements: SELECT * FROM supply_chain_transactions WHERE transaction_type = 'Purchase';
SELECT product_name, transaction_type FROM supply_chain_transactions WHERE transaction_date > '2021-01-01';
SELECT asset_id, product_name FROM supply_chain_transactions WHERE asset_id = 1001;
SELECT transaction_id, product_name FROM supply_chain_transactions ORDER BY transaction_date DESC;
SELECT DISTINCT transaction_type FROM supply_chain_transactions;
SELECT transaction_id, asset_id, product_name, transaction_date, transaction_type FROM supply_chain_transactions WHERE transaction_type = 'Purchase' ORDER BY transaction_date DESC LIMIT 10
SELECT product_name, COUNT(*) AS total_transactions FROM supply_chain_transactions GROUP BY product_name ORDER BY total_transactions DESC
SELECT DISTINCT product_name FROM supply_chain_transactions
SELECT transaction_id, asset_id, transaction_date FROM supply_chain_transactions WHERE transaction_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31' ORDER BY transaction_date
SELECT transaction_id, transaction_type FROM supply_chain_transactions WHERE asset_id IN (1, 2, 3)
SELECT * FROM supply_chain_transactions;
SELECT transaction_id, transaction_date, transaction_amount FROM supply_chain_transactions WHERE transaction_type = 'purchase';
SELECT * FROM asset_tokenization WHERE token_owner LIKE '%Alice%';
SELECT transaction_id, asset_token_id FROM supply_chain_transactions ORDER BY transaction_date DESC;
SELECT token_value, token_creation_date FROM asset_tokenization WHERE token_value > 1000 ORDER BY token_value ASC;
SELECT * FROM asset_tokenization WHERE token_creation_date < '2022-01-01';
SELECT transaction_id, transaction_date, transaction_type FROM supply_chain_transactions WHERE transaction_amount > 1000;
SELECT asset_token_id, token_value FROM asset_tokenization WHERE token_owner = 'Alice' ORDER BY token_value DESC;
SELECT t1.*, t2.* FROM supply_chain_transactions t1 JOIN asset_tokenization t2 ON t1.asset_token_id = t2.asset_token_id WHERE t1.transaction_amount < t2.token_value;
SELECT MAX(token_value) AS max_token_value FROM asset_tokenization;
SELECT * FROM SupplyChainTransactions;
SELECT product_name, quantity FROM SupplyChainTransactions WHERE quantity > 10;
SELECT transaction_timestamp, product_name FROM SupplyChainTransactions ORDER BY transaction_timestamp DESC;
SELECT token_owner, token_symbol FROM AssetTokenization;
SELECT authentication_id, authentication_timestamp, authenticated_by FROM Authentication WHERE authentication_timestamp > '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM SupplyChainTransactions;
SELECT transaction_timestamp, quantity FROM SupplyChainTransactions WHERE product_name = 'Product A';
SELECT token_id, token_symbol FROM AssetTokenization ORDER BY token_symbol ASC;
SELECT authentication_id, authentication_timestamp, authenticated_by FROM Authentication WHERE authentication_timestamp > '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM AssetTokenization WHERE token_owner = 'Alice' AND token_symbol LIKE 'ABC%';
SELECT * FROM supply_chain_transactions;
SELECT transaction_id, transaction_type, transaction_date FROM supply_chain_transactions ORDER BY transaction_date DESC;
SELECT product_name, description FROM product_details WHERE manufacturer_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
SELECT manufacturer_name, contact_email, headquarters_location FROM manufacturer_details WHERE manufacturer_name LIKE 'Company%';
SELECT * FROM asset_tokenization WHERE token_value > 1000 ORDER BY token_value ASC;
SELECT * FROM supply_chain_transactions WHERE transaction_type = 'Purchase';
SELECT transaction_date, quantity, unit_price FROM supply_chain_transactions WHERE transaction_type = 'Sale' ORDER BY transaction_date DESC;

SELECT asset_tokenization.token_name, asset_tokenization.token_type, asset_tokenization.token_value, product_details.product_name FROM asset_tokenization JOIN product_details ON asset_tokenization.token_id = product_details.product_id;
SELECT manufacturer_name, contact_email FROM manufacturer_details WHERE manufacturer_name LIKE '%Corp%' AND headquarters_location = 'USA';
SELECT * FROM supply_chain_transactions WHERE transaction_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31' ORDER BY unit_price DESC, quantity ASC;
SELECT * FROM transactions WHERE transaction_type = 'Buy'
SELECT transaction_date, transaction_type FROM transactions ORDER BY transaction_date DESC
SELECT asset_name, asset_value FROM assets WHERE asset_value > 1000
SELECT owner_name, owner_contact FROM owners ORDER BY owner_name
SELECT token_name, token_value FROM tokenization WHERE token_status = 'Active'
SELECT * FROM transactions WHERE transaction_type='purchase' ORDER BY transaction_date DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT asset_name, asset_value FROM assets WHERE asset_value > 10000 AND asset_owner_id=5;
SELECT token_name, SUM(token_value) FROM tokenization GROUP BY token_name HAVING SUM(token_value) > 5000;
SELECT th.history_id, th.history_date, t.token_name FROM transactions_history th JOIN tokenization t ON th.token_id = t.token_id ORDER BY th.history_date ASC;

SELECT o.owner_name, t.token_name, a.asset_name FROM owners o JOIN tokenization t ON o.owner_id = t.token_asset_id JOIN assets a ON t.token_asset_id = a.asset_id ORDER BY o.owner_name ASC, a.asset_name DESC;
